Name: Be A Lord
About the game: VR Entertainment present first VR game: Be a Lord It`s game to relax after hard working day. No long quests, saving or another boring stuffs. Simple fantasy Game: - 3 maps with a lot of enemies - Runic Weapons (Sword, Axe, Staff) - Realistics Enemies - Some blood effects (helpful if your boss was annoying today) Instruction B - Staff Shoot A- Run Joystick Right - Rotate Joystick Left - Move Menu Button - Return / Exit Game Credits for the music: Unbury Your Heart by Siobhan Dakay (c) copyright 2018 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license. Blind Love Dub by Jeris (c) copyright 2017 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license. Autumn's Dream Lullaby by gurdonark (c) copyright 2017 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution license. Hope Is A Dangerous Thing (Vo1k1 Mix) by vo1k1 (c) copyright 2018 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license. Paper Planes - Durden ft. Airtone by DURDEN (c) copyright 2016 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license. Hard Wired by Kara Square (c) copyright 2017 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license.
